audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - Historica Critica; Arnold Kuethe - 1985 March 10
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: Historica Critica

audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Program 4] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : Tape 2; Interview with Arnold Kuethe (Professor of Aerospace Engineering); Engineer's note: interview ends with discussion of his experiences at the University. Tape box says "remove female voice."
[Program 4] : [Side 2] : [Part 1] : Unexpected content; Excerpts from WCBN News discussing the Iran Hostage Crisis and the Omega-7 Bombings, dated 1979.
